thread.title: Cannot Connect to iTunes Store? You’re not Alone!
thread.title_full: Cannot Connect to iTunes Store? You’re not Alone!

author: Aaron Richardson
title: Cannot Connect to iTunes Store? You’re not Alone!
text:
Twitter 
Pretty much all morning I’ve been struggling with downloading apps and connecting to the iTunes Store on my iPhone . I’ve tried many solutions even trying to login on our iPad and on iTunes itself with no luck, and it seems like I’m not alone. Following a quick chat with AppleCare, it seems the iTunes Store and many other services are down for Apple right now. 
According to the very helpful AppleCare support rep, the company has been struggling with down time for the past three days and that it’s a problem that’s pretty wide-spread across multiple users. And it doesn’t take long for you to find other people with the same problem: いまiTunes storeに接続できない人世界で0.6%だって選ばれし0.6%になってしまったけど割とだるいからはやくなおして pic.twitter.com/SfJzngcehf 
— 河野 綺乃 (@ayapin1998) October 15, 2015 @iOS_Support @Ask_iCloud Not being able to sign into iTunes/app/store and @AppleMusic – Temporary unavailable pic.twitter.com/Bg959RCB8R 
— Dan Dias (@dandias) October 15, 2015 ¿A alguien le falla la App Store o iTunes Store? Parece que los servidores están caídos. #Apple #iTunes #AppStore
